history.content:
Climate Resilience Symposium Career Fair!

Thursday, March 10, 2022 | 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM PT

In collaboration with EDGE in Tech, AWE is hosting a Career Fair focused on advancing climate resilience. This virtual career fair will feature companies and startups in the climate resilience space and their career opportunities. Some company attendees include Meta, Agilent, Sandia, SAP, LLNL and many more. Come learn about how companies are integrating climate into their missions and to find your next job!

Register for your free ticket: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/2022-diversity-in-tech-symposium-advancing-climate-resilience-tickets-253460395867. You must register prior to the event.

Note: the career fair is also a part of the two day Diversity in Tech Climate Resilience Symposium. For more details, see the main Symposium site.
history.subject: FREE Climate Resilience Virtual Career Fair next Thursday
